testsuite.name: Script.RoomContextMenu_Notification
testsuite.system-out: Log into EWA Enter valid username into username text box Enter valid password into password text box Select a Room Click on Login button Session for user is already active.Do you want to create new session? dialog box displayed User click on OK button, User logged in successfully... User logged in successfully...

Scenario 07: Verify Roomcontextmenu tab Notification Option Expand a cabinet and expand a drawer to select a folder. Folder selected successfully... Mousehover on Roomcontext menu tab Select Notification option Expand a cabinet 1 Expand a cabinet 2 Expand a drawer 1 Expand a folder [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (1667336dbd138b5b55a837321fefe48a)] -> xpath: //div[@id='viewDocumentnavigator']/ul/li[2]/ul/li[1]/ul/li[1]/a] Notification dialog should be open Click on reset button Reset option verified successfully... Click on notification dropdown Select 'any changes to the folder' option Select 'any changes to the document' option from notification dropdown Click on apply button Select notification tab, it will show the notification for selected option If any changes have been made by other user in the selected notification folder, the specified user will receive a notification Folder/document/subfolder changes notified Notification option verified successfully
